entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning late this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 40 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
